name: Class DESKeySpec
text: This class specifies a DES key.
codes:
public class DESKeySpec
extends Object
implements KeySpec

fields.description: The constant which defines the length of a DES key in bytes.

methods.description:
Checks if the given DES key material, starting at offset
 inclusive, is parity-adjusted.
Checks if the given DES key material is weak or semi-weak.
